title: "Impressive elearning tech"
pros: Most of the feature are superb,very easy to use ,really recomment
cons: Every Feature they offer is good but the price can be too high for some who has limited budget.

title: "Easygenerator"
comment: I am solving a lot of new quiz/test and learnings on this platform every week. It helps me and my colleagues to make a quick refresher on a certain areas so I am not needed to ex. go to another training group while having new colleagues in training. The easy way of making and creating the courses are amazing, and the different ways of looking up the results feedback and making a report for own use in Excel are really useful and makes me save a lot of time. Fantastic platform, and I will be use it for future courses as well, I can honestly say I will not change to another one, even if the company provides a new platform for these things.
pros: I like the that you can make different e-learning courses, depending on the situation. I like the ease of use Easygenerator have, and the different templates to choose from. Makes it easier to quickly make a new test of E-Learning course. I like the webinars, all of them for tips, tricks and ideas on how this software can be used. I like the newly added Export for PDF file so the courses can be downloaded and sent out to persons with out access to the easygenerator site and/or our learning site.
cons: I do not have anything bad or liked the least of this software, all the things implemented into already are useful, easy to use.

title: "Easygenerator Review"
comment: Customer support from [SENSITIVE CONTENT HIDDEN] was 5star. She is calm, attentive and hardworking with a great can do attitude. thank you [SENSITIVE CONTENT HIDDEN] for all your help too.
pros: Easy to use
cons: The most frustrating element of the software is that you need to 'log out' in order for the system to recognise and count as 'complete'. Tis should be corrected and be applicable at the results page. This is causing a lot of frustration internally at Unilever where people are completing the course but as they have not clicked out at the end it did not count as completed only started. This is far from ideal and I would look at alternative solutions for learning platforms for further courses.

title: "A well made software limited perhaps by not being perfectly mobile responsive"
pros: 1) Visually the final courses look very professional and aesthetic. 2) Ease of use is tremendous 3) The pricing options are very comfortable and take care of all sections of people . Even a free version is available !
cons: 1) Some of the components of the course like hotspots and drag and drop are not very mobile responsive . 2) Pricing structure changes a bit too often . 3) Number of content types could be increased.

title: "Easy product for building e-learning"
pros: It's very easy to use, easy to try-out and I like that I can make changes while participants are signed in.
cons: I would like te have more flexibility in pass/fail the course. In my case, I needed a e-learning that would tell me IF a participant joined, and less about the right/wrong answers.

title: "Efficient Training"
comment: I think it's the best tool for training a lot of people in one time.
pros: What You Can Learn The Software in just a few minutes and saved a lot of time to create content and start training with a lot of people.
cons: voice over problems and the product is fairly expensive for small business companies.

title: "Definitely one of my favorites"
comment: It is truly a lifesaver for teachers who are extremely busy because it is extremely efficient.
pros: I like that Easygenerator is like the name says - easy to use and create a variety of engaging content necessary for e-learning. The design is contemporary and it will certainly attract modern learners. What I also liked is the variety of questions offered. It's exactly what is important to keep the learners interested and grab their attention.
cons: What I find as the only negative side of Easygenerator is the price. If you are working individually, make sure your budget can cover the a Pro package to get the best experience with this software. Sometimes documents look 'weird' when uploaded.

title: "Be a teacher in two seconds"
comment: Robust sharing your knowledge to your "students"
pros: I love how fast you can be a teacher to your group of people. You can review your software code and teach functionality and theory of algorithms. I used it to teach science like Mathematics for high school students mostly remotely.
cons: They should implement more like game-educational style of learning for making learning more fun.

title: "Easygenerator - the name is program..."
comment: As stated earlier... This is the right thing.
pros: This tool is the right thing to quickly create onlinecourses for training and education.
cons: While creating an course I've found an "missing" functionality, especially in creating a certain way of an "multiple choice" drag and drop question. After my question in the online help chat it took only 5 min to get an answer. Unfrotunately the requested function is not yet implemented but will be in a future version. I'm eager to find out...

title: "It's in the name"
pros: Ease of use, great functionality that is continuously improving.
cons: Some limitations around configuring the SCORM output; cannot force videos to be watch before completing next section of the learning

title: "Go for it, it will blow your mind! "
comment: Great. Easy to use, powerful (include well thought collaboration features, easy publication on mobile...)
pros: Ease of use / even fun to create training Remove LOTS of administration complexity in training preparation
cons: I would have loved to have this available 10 years ago when I was preparing (a lot) more trainings.

title: "Intuitive and Smart Online Training Solution"
comment: Easygenerator allowed us to easily develop internal computer-based training courses such as Onboarding, quality management, specialized training and refresher training courses. The ease of use and the intuitive training features help our team to respond equally fast to both planned and add-hoc requests for internal training. There is a learning curve to master EasyGenerator, but their customer service is always there to help.
pros: These are the EG features we like the most so far: - Robust training environment with powerful learning and testing capabilities - User-friendly interface and intuitive structure - Easy to get going, particularly using the provided templates - Useful add-ons such as PPT conversion - Good integration capability with other LMS - Excellent customer support - very friendly and supportive - Constant improvement and development
cons: The product could be enhanced in the following areas: - Give users more content formatting tools - Add more fonts or let users upload their own fonts - Provide optional training image and video library to build content easier - Keep adding more templates based on typical training models/subjects, e.g. software training. - Add LMS capabilities eventually

title: "Quick and simple solution for education and learning needs."
comment: We needed internal training for employees who travel and are across the country. Conference calls and PPT were not cutting it. This was a very quick and economical way to deliver targeted training and know that people completed it and passed the quizes.
pros: Its extremely to us, you can be as creative or as simple as you choose. Its quick to implement and its user friendly. All you need is the URL link to the course and your set!
cons: The audit trail reporting is very basic. It would be great to have a few simple features to measure learner attempts at questions and to have options in the reporting. Being able to extract to Excel is a good feature but the data points are very basic

title: "Resuscitation Skills: learning that saves lives."
comment: Were reducing time spent on pre-course learning and moving towards a total e-solution model of learning. No paper.
pros: Flexibility and ease of use means I can produce great content fast and adopt changes to evidence quickly and efficiently
cons: Replicating content that is common to multiple courses can be a little clumsy

title: "Easy to learn and use. Great support team!"
pros: I conduct technical training using video-based training aids. It's easy to learn and use. Easygenerator provides great support and I highly recommend them.
cons: I would love to be able to integrate videos and work instructions in the same flow.

title: "Easygenerator's short learning curve enables us to produce a lot of high quality e-learning"
comment: The transfer of offline training to online training.
pros: The ease of use and simplicity of the UI.
cons: No branching and no integration for screen capture, to develop software package training

title: "A wonderful e-learning course creator."
comment: Enjoy the experience. Its worth it. I found this as a multi-platform supportive tool.
pros: I used this easy generator tool to migrate courses from Articulate 360. I thoroughly enjoyed using the Test/Assessment section and enjoyed the Template Management.
cons: Last time I had used Easygenerator was sometime in April 2019. Until then, what I found most challenging task for content creation was to get into the third level of sub headings and content. It had allowed only 2 levels. Not sure if this feature has been fixed by now.

title: "Easy just got easier!!"
comment: Excellent product, easy to use, good features and really good support.
pros: Quick and easy to use with very good support.
cons: You cannot add a voiceover without a play bar. You should be able to add a voiceover that starts once the slide/screen has been reached.

title: "Easy to create with guided experiences"
comment: Excellent regular trainings for optimum use of easygenerator, also great support and the courses always look so great.
pros: So easy to navigate through the course and love the suggestions that come up as you are creating to create interactive e learning that looks impressive as well.
cons: It would be great to be able to organise the courses in a different view or into folders once you get a lot its always a little annoying scrolling through them all to find the one you want to update.

title: "Highly recommended "
pros: First time using software to build training course & surprised how easy it was to use
cons: Nothing to compare it to but thought loading videos to course material could be simpliet

title: "This product is user friendly and produces an impressive product"
comment: Made my job of creating a training 'manual' much easier!
pros: The product is easy to navigate, finished product looks impressive and professional. Love the ability to add Q/A blocks to test user's understanding of training material.
cons: Printed PDF produces "weird"spacing in the text. Would like to duplicate the course in its entirety- then add or delete blocks from the copied version. For example one for in house training and second for client specific training.

title: "Great tool for basic learning modules"
comment: It allowed me to test a concept I had in my mind, to see if it would be interesting enough to spend time and money to have a professional team develop it.
pros: I like the ease of use, it is incredibly simple to start playing around with it and build a learning. Easygenerator is an office staple for me, much like powerpoint and word.
cons: While I get the standardization, it is a bit too standardized, which makes it difficult to adjust certain headings or elements in the tool. The navigation could be more user friendly in the learning itself, and a search option would be really cool. Overall, I like the tool, but it just doesn't allow me to make the specific adjustments I need to make to meet my requirements (though to the credit of the tool, it wasn't designed to do what I wanted to use it for).

title: "Great Tool for Creating Online Learning!"
pros: Ease of use and ability to insert various learning tools into the courses - i.e. documents, links, images, quizzes etc.
cons: I like the software, but the course that is output sometimes contains a lot of scrolling to get to the "next" key. It would be nice if we could resize objects more readily or extend to a second page without having to create a new header or section.

title: "Easy and powerful tool to create and share trainings."
comment: Fast and easy solution to create and share interactive trainings on a common platform. High engagement level on trainee and also trainer level. Great value for money, also purchase department is happy.
pros: - As it is not complicated to create a training, you can focus on the content and do not need to be an expert regarding training development solutions. - The trainee receives a more interactive training which is supporting a high engagement level. - The tool rescues trainiees from the "death by powerpoint". So far I do not have come across of any cons. The easygenerator team is constantly working on improvements and very open to feedback.

title: "I use Easygenerator since 2016 ! I simply love it!"
reviewer_role: Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt
comment: Reach more people in a world class environment!
pros: So easy to use! User interface is incredible! I had a chance to develop two diferent trainings! And I hope to develop many more!
cons: Few words were not translated to Portuguese... the automatic email (whitelist) was not translated in Portuguese

title: "Create E-learnings easily with Easygenerator "
comment: A convenient one-stop solution to all E-learning solutions for training and learning that makes my job so much easier.
pros: Co-creation and progress tracking are my favourite features of Easygenerator. They offer a wide variety of templates and a diverse range of question types, which I love.
cons: It's not easy to use, you need to go through some tutorials or exploration before you get started with creating a course.

title: "Great potential for training content creators"
pros: It is very easy to create new content for the trainings and also the implementation of AI is really a game changer
cons: Not everything is yet accessible, but I can see a great potential once all the functions will become available

title: "A simple solution for non-designers"
pros: It's very simple to use and has a user friendly interface. Anyone can create an online course within minutes. I like how the content is divided in different sections and that you can generate a feedback link for people to review without having an EasyGenerator account.
cons: I wouldn't call it an authoring tool, it's more like a quick solution for people who don't have the knowledge and skills to use a tool like Storyline or Captivate. It's very basic, so as an Instructional Designer, I'd prefer a more versatile tool that allows me to create immersive and engaging material, interactive scenarios and more advanced assessments. EasyGenerator includes only text, video, images, links and a few interactions like flip cards. The quizzing options are very limited, and so is the scenario feature.

title: "Great tool for rapid course development"
comment: Thus far great. And as I am a demanding customer I replied with numerous enhancement requests already. But the tool itself is rock solid.
pros: I learned to use the tool in a day without a guidline. I liked the contect blocks and easy to use software. What rocks is the built in support with chat options. I learn quickly, but this helped to experiment with some concepts while asking an expert and leads to discussions for improvements. That human contact is the best I have ever seen!
cons: I would like to maintain the library and re-upload images or video and that it is then uploaded in the courses where the asset is used. I also would like to create / save custom content blocks and preferably share these with my team.

title: "The ticket to successful trainings!"
comment: Our company is growing fast, we have multiple departments so it's difficult for us to train new employees one on one. Easygenerator gives us the ability to create short and easy-to-understand courses for employees to do so they can start to learn terminology and the basics of the industry. The team has been amazing to work with, making sure I know how to utilize the features within the platform. They even set me up with a consultant to go over best practices and how to cater to my learners.
pros: It's simple to use, I was able to spend a day or two learning how to navigate and then I could really focus on creating content. The features such as the objective creator really help me to ensure I'm creating focusing on one topic and not getting off track. I have not tried to integrate with or LMS yet, we're using this as a stand-alone platform.
cons: You can reuse sections, which is great, but if you change something in the section for Course 1, it will change it in Course 2. It's not a problem, but it would make things a bit easier if I could duplicate the section and change it to fit whatever I needed in that course.

title: "Create high quality learning content quickly and efficiently!"
comment: We have been able to take a more holistic approach to our training delivery. A benefit of Easy Generator to meet this goal is the ability to incorporate documents, videos, images, content, and assessment all in a single course. As we include our SMEs in content development, Easy Generator also solves the problem that our experts, while knowledgeable, are not content creators by nature. Easy Generator makes it an intuitive process and allows for collaboration between users and oversight from our L&D team to ensure that all content is of high quality prior to delivery to our learners.
pros: The best part about Easy Generator is how fast it can be learned to immediately start creating content from the first day. Everything is user friendly and it was easy to keep our training content on brand. In addition to the ease of use, the customer service we have experienced so far has been incredible. They understand our needs and have worked with us to maximize our plan while staying within our budget.
cons: It can be tedious to find and upload external stock images and other content to include in our training courses, where similar programs may offer a content library internally. Also the layout options are limited. These are minor inconveniences however and do not detract from the overall positive experience that we have had so far! The only true dislike we have is the inability to require learners to view video content in order to move on. Currently, learners can skip the video entirely which limits our ability to track overall effectiveness.

title: "A Game Changer! "
comment: We are a small textbook publishing company that utilizes Easygenerator as the platform for our online textbooks. After researching software solutions, we chose Easygenerator and have never looked back. The flexibility of the software as well as the ease of use has been a perfect fit for our company. Thank you!
pros: We are a small company that was looking for a solution that we could manage in-house without having to hire new technical staff or utilize a third party. Easygenerator allows us to manage the software with staff that has limited technical skills, thus the "easy" part of the name really lives up to its billing. The development team is always updating the program and very receptive to our ideas for new features. New features are added monthly and the support staff is incredibly personable and talented. We are extremely satisfied with Easygenerator!
cons: We have not learned how to integrate Easygenerator into various learning management systems and it seems that it might be an overwhelming process for our limited skills set.

title: "Extremely easy to use , interactive, engaging, and fun."
pros: The name is no lie. It's an incredibly efficient and easy to use tool as both a content builder and as a lesson taker. It's a million times more interactive and engaging than any other solution we've used before with all the different types of question and content options. Since we moved to EasyGenerator almost a year ago, our agents are more engaged and excited to get into lessons than ever. Learning has become fun as well as necessary. Love the integration with Branchtrack. Scenarios are a great way to really speak to the nuances of language and how to speak to a customer, especially when trying to gauge their emotion throughout a conversation. The support is also exceptional, especially considering they are in a completely different time zone across the world from us. Super friendly, helpful anytime we have a question, and receptive to feedback. When we knew we had to improve our current learning ethos and software, we set forth on an exhaustive search to find a better solution. We set up trials with various eLearning tools and created lessons that we presented to our agents before asking for feedback on all of them at the end. Our agents overwhelmingly voted for EasyGenerator, our content building team overwhelmingly voted for it, and with such a great price and value, EasyGenerator was a no brainer from the agent level to C-level.
cons: We certainly have things on our wishlist, like more study-based questions, such as flashcard functionality, simple games for even more fun learning options, and more robust reporting, especially the ability to track learners across various courses. But none of these things are truly cons as it stands. Especially since the EasyGenerator team is so receptive to feedback and genuinely interested in new ideas to make their solution even better.

title: "Powerful and easy to use"
pros: What I like the most about EasyGenerator is how smooth the user experience is. It is so intuitive that you can master the tool in just a few minutes. You can feel they have designed it with the end user in mind, there are many functionalities that just made my life so much easier. I really enjoy the possibility to customize the theme colours to make a elearning on brand which makes the elearning look very professional towards our customers. Their customer support is always available and super helpful, I really enjoy the fact to be able to chat with them live when I have an issue, they have gone the extra mile multiple times to support me. Iâ€™d recommend it to anyone, and I actually did already several times, and the feedback was always extremely positive.
cons: To be honest, nothing I can think of. I feel EasyGenerator is always ahead of my needs.

title: "Simple yet powerful interface, excellent support and quality finished product."
comment: I am able to reach customers that have logistical constraints and provide them with quality learning tools. I can create refresher courses for people that have already been on Face 2 Face training and save them time and money on re-training. I can showcase new features quicker and to a larger audience. My advice is, go for it! EasyGenerator won't let you down, the support on offer makes the implementation seamless and the product features are plenty to create high quality learning tools.
pros: The speed at which courses can be created and the general ease of use of the setup. The support from the team is excellent and speedy. The implementation was quick and easy. The tutorial available gives you enough information to begin creating courses right away and the tool is packed with features that allow you to offer an interactive experience to the user.
cons: I would like notified before updates are done as I sometimes need to access the site when upgrades are being completed. If I had prior knowledge of these upgrades I could plan ahead.

title: "A lifesaver for a busy professor"
comment: So far, the software has allowed me to quickly develop online support modules for students. By now, I'm using it to create a "parallel universe" involving online materials for students who can't attend the class face-to-face. There's no way I'd be able to do this without such an easy to use system.
pros: Ease of use. Practically no learning curve. Creating a reasonable online experience for my students (or support for a face-to-face offer) is as easy as creating a powerpoint presentation or even a word document. Their customer service and support are excellent too.
cons: Inevitably, easy of use could be accompanied by certain limitations. One can't do "anything" one wants from a "bells and whistles" standpoint. For example, I'd like to see more games or a connection to a games software that could be incorporated. That said, the company is excellent in listening to its customers and frequently adding improvements.

title: "Easygenerator delivers what is "says on the box""
comment: Back to my title: Easygenerator delivers what is "says on the box"
pros: Easy to use - all required features are present
cons: I'm very proficient using the authoring tools, but would like to learn more about course management and publishing

title: "Client Support is worth it alone"
comment: Starting a program for userbase experts which is working beautifully. My team is creating trainings (even technical trainings) with quizzes and interactions; something that we have never been able to do before. Simply; it's been awesome.
pros: While the tool alone merits a 10/10 recommendation, I'm here to praise the incredible support they provide. I'm not the admin but it's still so easy to reach them, hear back from them, and get clear and helpful answers. They haven't once told me to contact someone else (interally), and they are regularly inviting us to these great webinars that go MILES to help me develop top quality trainings. Their [SENSITIVE CONTENT HIDDEN] conducted one of their seminars last year about how to make the case for a "userbase experts as course creators" program to your C suite, I have used concepts from that seminar 10 times over in conversations with leadership and management. I once mentioned to our rep that I'm trying to implement something like this, and she periodically checks in to ask how she can support it. Their customer service simply cannot be over praised. EasyGenerator is the bar by which I compare all other authoring tools (and their customer service).
cons: The user interface can be a little confusing at first, what with the sections on the left that you need to drag in, and then also needing to drag in sections... But honestly it's not something that should be changed... because once you get used to it, it is super functional and helps keep things organized. It also helps stay super organized as you are designing... which works in the learners benefit.

title: "Easygenerator has a lot potential and easy to use!"
comment: So far, I am positive concerning this tool, also the customer support is always there for you, excellent!This tool is easy to use to create essential e-learning with interactions.
pros: This authoring tool allows me to develop essential and friendly e-learning courses. The e-learning development interface is intuitive. Everyone can develop interesting e-learning in a few minutes. They are adding new features very often.The easygenerator support team is always there for you, via chat, they answer your questions just in minutes.
cons: So far, the company does the maintenance on its platform every Thursday morning, so you have to plan ahead because the server is down for a couple of hours. This could change soon!

title: "Fantastic eLearning tool that is only getting better. They're actively improving this daily!"
comment: It has allowed us to create a blended learning environment while at the same time easing our curriculum writers into online course building with a very simple and effective tool.
pros: I like the ease of use of this software. It is very very easy to become proficient and the options and customization are constantly being updated and tweaked. The question types are widely varied which allows for a wealth of engagement. The interface is smooth and intuitive and the overall look and feel of the site is fantastic.
cons: It only exports SCORM 1.2 files while other eLearning software exports in SCORM 2004 files. The text editor can be temperamental and the Branchtrack tool is neat but impractical for heavy use. The results data is also very clunky with limited ability to run reports.

title: "easygenerator is really easy to use to create great looking and didactical valueble courses"
comment: Very powerful and flexible tool with which we can create courses for all our customers from all kinds of branches. We also use it to create quick internal onboarding lessons.
pros: - Great variety of questions - Real responsive design, so you only need to create one course for all devices - We can create our own template with own didactic which makes the tool really powerful for our business - Very modern look and feel - Creating a course with just a couple of clicks.
cons: - the variety of animated elements is still growing but currently a little bit limited. - including external content is currently a little bit tidious, but the introduction of the document library should make this a lot easier.

title: "My fav tool to make an interactive e-learnings!"
comment: My experience is very good, sometimes I had trouble collecting data, but this problem has disappeared.
pros: I love the variety of the tool and the ever-changing possibilities. The support is really helpful and open for feedback.
cons: I miss more interactive tasks. Sometimes I have problems with implementing external quizzes.

title: "A fabulous Learning Management System that makes active learning come alive"
comment: A delightful company to work with. Highly customer-focused. Could not ask for more.
pros: We moved from Brainshark to EasyGenerator at LECOM School of Pharmacy this year and the transition has been very well received by faculty and students. "Easy" is absolutely on the money! Creating courses and interactivity has never been more simple. But more importantly, the pedagogy of active learner is built right into the software and the education created supports student engagement and learning retention. The support is sensational. I would give them a 15/10! And their head is a sensational leader of the organization. His vision for LMS is spectacular and comes alive in EasyGenerator.
cons: There are few features missing that we would like to see for our curriculum. However, each time I point this out to the development team, they put it in the queue so I am hopeful that with time the product will evolve to include all the necessary elements.

title: "Amazing Authoring Tool"
comment: Genuinely makes my e-learning platform look so much more professional and if I have a problem they help immediately.
pros: The product price was the initial pull but the customer support and the accessibility and ease of use is perfect! The team are great!
cons: I would like more functionality as sometimes it can be a little inflexible but since I started the improvements are happening and are so far exactly what is needed.

title: "Absolutely amazing!"
pros: Extremely user friendly for end users and developers !
cons: Nothing major! Sometimes there is a delay in downloading the results.

title: "Great software tool for e-learning modules with your own company brand"
comment: A lot of fun!
pros: Very easy to use. Good variety of tools Possibility to include your own company brand
cons: Would love to see more options for questions

title: "New way of making e-learning"
comment: We have found a way to reduce our costs for making e-learnings and are more flexible to support our employees with new skills and features. It is a great tool to get people learn all required regulations in a thorough way, with clear administration
pros: The EG is a very easy to use tool, our users can easily added to the tool and with a quick introduction they can start. There are a lot of possibilities to work wit, and a great way to share information with your employees.
cons: The support is great, and at this moment we are looking for ways to make the integration with our LMS perfect.

title: "Easygenerator allows me to create the courses that I want easily, and to effectively track users."
pros: The ability to create engaging content with a lot of functionality. I love being able to add customized code!
cons: Design interface is a bit clunky and it's not easy to duplicate course items inside of a course. This is an easy fix and the easygenerator team is always making new functions, which is great!

title: "Very happy whith easygenerator"
pros: Very steady processing and the program is easy to learn
cons: Nothing everything works and the service is good

title: ""Easy" way to create User-generated training"
pros: Easygenerator is a simple tool for anyone to pick up and create eLearning courses. It has transformed the way we create training at my company, allowing users to more easily, quickly and cost-efficiently share their knowledge with teams and throughout the organization. Support is world class, and many updates are made behind the scenes, not impacting users at all. The output is responsive design - allowing it to be used anywhere.
cons: There is very little not to like. It's easy, with quick learning curve and world-class support. If only my LMS supported responsive design, then we would be in heaven.
